title: Frontend Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 EVIDENT is an SFC\\-licensed investment platform that is transforming private market investing through innovative blockchain technology. Our platform digitizes the entire asset lifecycle, creating a seamless connection between asset managers and investment partners. We are committed to making private markets more accessible to a diverse range of investors, unlocking high\\-quality opportunities, and fostering positive innovation. Our mission is to democratize private market investment, empowering capital allocation that drives meaningful and lasting change in the financial landscape.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a dedicated and skilled Frontend Engineer to join our team in a full\\-time remote capacity. The successful candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and optimizing user\\-facing features to ensure a seamless and responsive web experience. This role requires collaboration with cross\\-functional teams including product managers, designers, and backend developers to deliver high\\-quality software solutions. The Frontend Engineer will play a key role in maintaining and enhancing our platform’s user interface, ensuring it remains intuitive, efficient, and aligned with the latest technological standards. Staying current with emerging frontend trends and technologies is essential, as is troubleshooting performance issues to uphold an exceptional user experience.
   

  

**Qualifications**
* Proficiency in front\\-end development and responsive web design principles.
* Strong experience in web development and software engineering.
* Working knowledge of backend web development and integration processes.
* Ability to write clean, scalable, and maintainable code.
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills with keen attention to detail.
* Hands\\-on experience with modern frontend frameworks such as React, Angular, or Vue.js.
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience.
* Familiarity with blockchain technology is a plus, providing an understanding of decentralized systems and digital asset management.


**Responsibilities**
 The Frontend Engineer will be responsible for developing and implementing user interface components that are both functional and visually appealing. Key responsibilities include translating UI/UX designs into high\\-quality code, ensuring responsiveness across various devices and browsers, and optimizing web applications for maximum speed and scalability. The engineer will work closely with product managers and designers to understand user requirements and translate them into technical solutions. Additionally, the role involves maintaining and improving existing features, troubleshooting bugs, and addressing performance bottlenecks. Staying updated with the latest frontend technologies and best practices is vital to continuously enhance the platform’s usability and security. The engineer will also participate in code reviews, contribute to technical documentation, and support deployment and testing processes.
   

  

**Benefits**
 At EVIDENT, we value our team members and offer a comprehensive benefits package designed to support your professional and personal growth. Benefits include competitive salary packages, flexible remote working arrangements, and opportunities for continuous learning and development. We also provide health insurance coverage, paid time off, and wellness programs to promote a healthy work\\-life balance. Our collaborative and innovative environment encourages creativity and initiative, offering you the chance to be at the forefront of technological advancements in the financial industry. Additionally, employees have access to various professional development resources, networking opportunities, and participation in industry conferences and seminars.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 EVIDENT is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based on race, ethnicity, gender, age, sexual orientation, disability, religion, or any other protected characteristic. We believe that diverse perspectives and backgrounds foster innovation and drive our success. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to any protected status, and we are dedicated to providing a workplace where everyone can thrive and contribute to our shared mission.

title: Software Development Engineer in Test
description:
We’re looking for a passionate Software Development Engineer in Test. In today’s work environment, employees use a myriad of devices to access IT applications and data over multiple networks to stay productive, wherever and however they work. Ivanti elevates and secures Everywhere Work so that people and organizations can thrive.
   

  

 While our headquarters is in the U.S., half of our employees and customers are outside the country. We have 36 offices in 23 nations, with significant offices in London, Frankfurt, Paris, Sydney, Shanghai, Singapore, and other major cities around the world.
   

  

 Ivanti’s mission is to be a global technology leader enabling organizations to elevate Everywhere Work, automating tasks that discover, manage, secure, and service all their IT assets. Through diverse and inclusive hiring, decision\\-making, and commitment to our employees and partners, we will continue to build and deliver world\\-class solutions for our customers.
   

  

**Why this role matters**
 Your expertise will drive quality for Ivanti’s mission\\-critical Product, rock\\-solid, secure, and user\\-friendly—empowering organizations to thrive in the Everywhere Workplace. Join our collaborative team and champion test excellence that enhances both user experience and product trust.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Work closely with Development team to ensure top\\-notch product quality.
* Work through design specifications and create test plans to validate end to end scenarios.
* Work with agile team to deliver test coverage for acceptance criteria.
* Collaborate with team members on testing activities and estimation for test efforts.
* Automate the test scenarios and contribute in CI/CD pipeline.
* Experience with integration and API\\-based testing.
* Create dynamic testbeds quickly based on the product /customer requirements.
* Excellent analytical and trouble shooting skills while reporting issues and tracking them.


**What You Will Bring**
* 1 to 4 years of experience in Automation Scripting and framework development along with Infra libraries.
* Experience in Functional Automation in networking domain.
* The profile demands a person to be well versed in scripting, Automation skills in Python, Perl, Robot framework and tools like Selenium, Katalon, Auto\\-IT, Sikuli, etc
* Hands on with Virtual Infra management (Vcentre, Vsphere)
* Knowledge on REST API automation and Micro services testing
* Knowledge of tools like ADO, Confluence, Git, Jenkins.
* Sound networking fundamentals in L3/L4, TCP/IP, HTTPS, DNS, SSL/TLS, DHCP, NTP, etc
* Exposure to any one of AWS/Azure/Google cloud will be an additional advantage.


**Who You Are**
* A quality advocate—driven, organized, and proactive
* Strong collaborator with excellent communication skills
* Eager to mentor and empower others
* Curious, solution\\-focused, and constantly learning


**Why Ivanti?**
* Remote\\-friendly, flexible schedules—empowering excellence wherever you are
* Competitive compensation \\& benefits for you and your family
* Diverse global teams—work with smart, engaged people from 25 countries
* Outstanding learning \\& development programs
* A commitment to equity \\& belonging—your story matters here


**What Drives Us**
 Ivanti’s mission is to elevate human potential within organizations by managing, protecting and automating technology for continuous innovation.
   

  

 It is through diverse and inclusive hiring, decision\\-making, and commitment to our employees and partners that we will continue to build and deliver world\\-class solutions for our customers. To learn more about Ivanti’s Mission and Core Values
   

  

**Ready to shape the future of mobile quality at Ivanti?**
 Apply now!
   

  

 Ivanti is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

title: Software Engineer I - Data Engineer
description:
**Working with Us**
 Challenging. Meaningful. Life\\-changing. Those aren't words that are usually associated with a job. But working at Bristol Myers Squibb is anything but usual. Here, uniquely interesting work happens every day, in every department. From optimizing a production line to the latest breakthroughs in cell therapy, this is work that transforms the lives of patients, and the careers of those who do it. You'll get the chance to grow and thrive through opportunities uncommon in scale and scope, alongside high\\-achieving teams. Take your career farther than you thought possible.
   

  

 Bristol Myers Squibb recognizes the importance of balance and flexibility in our work environment. We offer a wide variety of competitive benefits, services and programs that provide our employees with the resources to pursue their goals, both at work and in their personal lives. Read more careers.bms.com/working\\-with\\-us .
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* The Data Engineer will be responsible for designing, building, and maintaining the data products, evolution of the data products, and utilize the most suitable data architecture required for our organization's data needs to support GPS.
* Responsible for delivering high quality, data products and analytic ready data solutions.
* Develop and maintain data models to support our reporting and analysis needs.
* Optimize data storage and retrieval to ensure efficient performance and scalability.
* Collaborate with data architects, data analysts and data scientists to understand their data needs and ensure that the data infrastructure supports their requirements.
* Ensure data quality and integrity through data validation and testing.
* Implement and maintain security protocols to protect sensitive data.
* Stay up to date with emerging trends and technologies in data engineering and analytics.
* Participate in the analysis, design, build, manage, and operate lifecycle of the enterprise data lake and analytics focused digital capabilities.
* Develop cloud\\-based (AWS) data pipelines to facilitate data processing and analysis.
* Define data operations support (example Access management) and experience with the supporting tools.
* Build e\\-2\\-e data ETL pipelines from data integration \\-\\> data processing \\-\\> data integration \\-\\> visualization.
* Proficient in Python, Spark, SQL, AWS Redshift/DBs, S3, Glue/Glue\\-Studio.
* Good to have Athena/Any Metadata platform (Like CDP\\-Impala or Okera), IAM, CFT \\& other Native AWS Service familiarity with Domino/data lake principles.
* Familiarity and experience with Cloud infrastructure management and work closely with the Cloud engineering team.
* Participate in effort and cost estimations when required.
* Partner with other data, platform, and cloud teams to identify opportunities for continuous improvements.
* Architect and develop data solutions according to legal and company guidelines.
* Assess system performance and recommend improvements.
* Responsible for maintaining of data acquisition/operational focused capabilities including Data Catalog; User Access Request/Tracking; Data Use Request.


**Required**
* Bachelor's degree in computer science, Information Systems, Computer Engineering or equivalent is preferred.
* 1\\-3 years of experience in information technology field in developing AWS cloud native data lakes and ecosystems.
* Deeper understanding of cloud technologies preferably AWS and related services in delivering and supporting data and analytics solutions/data lakes.
* 1\\-3 years of experience with operations and production support, and optimizing the supporting process
* Atleast 1\\-2 years of experience in an onshore offshore delivery model.
* Solid programming skills in Python and Spark and strong proficiency in Cloud \\- AWS
* Knowledge of data security and privacy best practices.


**Ideal Candidates would also have**
* Prior experience in global life sciences especially in the GPS functional area will be a plus.
* Experience working internationally with a globally dispersed team including diverse stakeholders and management of offshore technical development team(s).
* Strong communication and presentation skills.


 If you come across a role that intrigues you but doesn't perfectly line up with your resume, we encourage you to apply anyway. You could be one step away from work that will transform your life and career.
   

  

**Uniquely Interesting Work, Life\\-changing Careers**
 With a single vision as inspiring as Transforming patients' lives through science™ , every BMS employee plays an integral role in work that goes far beyond ordinary. Each of us is empowered to apply our individual talents and unique perspectives in a supportive culture, promoting global participation in clinical trials, while our shared values of passion, innovation, urgency, accountability, inclusion and integrity bring out the highest potential of each of our colleagues.
   

  

**On\\-site Protocol**
 BMS has an occupancy structure that determines where an employee is required to conduct their work. This structure includes site\\-essential, site\\-by\\-design, field\\-based and remote\\-by\\-design jobs. The occupancy type that you are assigned is determined by the nature and responsibilities of your role
   

  

 Site\\-essential roles require 100% of shifts onsite at your assigned facility. Site\\-by\\-design roles may be eligible for a hybrid work model with at least 50% onsite at your assigned facility. For these roles, onsite presence is considered an essential job function and is critical to collaboration, innovation, productivity, and a positive Company culture. For field\\-based and remote\\-by\\-design roles the ability to physically travel to visit customers, patients or business partners and to attend meetings on behalf of BMS as directed is an essential job function.
   

  

**Supporting People With Disabilities**
 BMS is dedicated to ensuring that people with disabilities can excel through a transparent recruitment process, reasonable workplace accommodations/adjustments and ongoing support in their roles. Applicants can request a reasonable workplace accommodation/adjustment prior to accepting a job offer. If you require reasonable accommodations/adjustments in completing this application, or in any part of the recruitment process, direct your inquiries to adastaffingsupport@bms.com . Visit careers.bms.com/ eeo \\-accessibility to access our complete Equal Employment Opportunity statement.
   

  

**Candidate Rights**
 BMS will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records, pursuant to applicable laws in your area.
   

  

 If you live in or expect to work from Los Angeles County if hired for this position, please visit this page for important additional information https //careers.bms.com/california\\-residents/
   

  

**Data Protection**
 We will never request payments, financial information, or social security numbers during our application or recruitment process. Learn more about protecting yourself at https //careers.bms.com/fraud\\-protection.
   

  

 Any data processed in connection with role applications will be treated in accordance with applicable data privacy policies and regulations.

title: Senior Staff Software Engineer
description:
At SolarWinds, we’re a people\\-first company. Our purpose is to enrich the lives of the people we serve—including our employees, customers, shareholders, partners, and communities. Join us in our mission to help customers accelerate business transformation with simple, powerful, and secure solutions.
 



 The ideal candidate thrives in an innovative, fast\\-paced environment and is collaborative, accountable, ready, and empathetic. We’re looking for individuals who believe they can accomplish more as a team and create lasting growth for themselves and others. We hire based on attitude, competency, and commitment. Solarians are ready to advance our world\\-class solutions in a fast\\-paced environment and accept the challenge to lead with purpose. If you’re looking to build your career with an exceptional team, you’ve come to the right place. Join SolarWinds and grow with us!
 







**Position Overview:** 




 We are seeking a Senior Staff Software Engineer to lead the development of our Security Observability. In this role, you will reimagine how enterprises observe, automate, and act upon security data. Your expertise will help guide the creation of intelligent, data\\-driven solutions that transform how our customers monitor and secure their distributed infrastructure and applications.
 



 As a Senior Staff Engineer, you will contribute to defining the architectural direction of our observability products and drive strategic initiatives to ensure SolarWinds continues to lead in the market. This is a high\\-impact, hands\\-on leadership role, ideal for someone who thrives on solving complex, high\\-scale technical challenges while mentoring teams and influencing technical decisions.
 



**Key Responsibilities:** 




 • Architect \\& Innovate: Lead the design and development of scalable, secure, and high\\-performance cloud\\-native security observability solutions.
   

 • Strategic Leadership: Drive the implementation of next\\-generation product features and prototypes that meet customer needs while keeping an eye on market trends.
   

 • Collaboration \\& Mentorship: Work closely with cross\\-functional teams, including product management, architecture, and remote engineering teams, to align product roadmaps with business goals. Mentor and elevate engineering talent through direct leadership and technical guidance.
   

 • Customer Engagement: Collaborate with customers to understand their pain points and provide solutions that help them better observe, secure, and automate their security infrastructure.
   

 • Thought Leadership: Stay at the forefront of industry trends, research competitive technologies, and develop disruptive, future\\-facing solutions.
   

 • Tech Culture Advocate: Foster a culture of modern software development practices and open\\-source collaboration. Lead by example and promote architectural excellence.
   

 • Continuous Learning: Stay up to date with emerging technologies and methodologies to influence product development.
 



**Your Experience:** 




 • Education: Bachelor’s degree (14\\+ years of experience) or Master’s degree (10\\+ years of experience) in Computer Science or related fields.
   

 • Enterprise Software Expertise: Strong design and development experience with enterprise products, specifically in Java technologies and Springboot or Dropwizard frameworks.
   

 • Cloud \\& Microservices: Proficiency with Docker/Containers, Microservices, SaaS architectures, and building scalable cloud\\-native applications.
   

 • Data Storage \\& Distributed Systems: Solid understanding of both RDBMS and NoSQL data storage, as well as distributed computing concepts.
   

 • Cloud Platforms: Experience with AWS, Azure, GCP, VMware, and/or Kubernetes with manifest creation.
   

 • Programming Knowledge: Familiarity with scripting languages like Python and modern development tools.
   

 • Leadership Skills: Proven ability to lead technical teams, make high\\-level architectural decisions, and mentor junior engineers.
   

 • Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross\\-functional teams.
 



**Nice\\-to\\-Have Skills:**
 Knowledge about GraphQL, Zoo Keeper and Kafka
 







 SolarWinds is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. SolarWinds will consider all qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, disability, veteran status or any other characteristic protected by law.
 



 All applications are treated in accordance with the SolarWinds Privacy Notice: https://www.solarwinds.com/applicant\\-privacy\\-notice

title: Senior Staff Software Engineer
description:
At SolarWinds, we’re a people\\-first company. Our purpose is to enrich the lives of the people we serve—including our employees, customers, shareholders, partners, and communities. Join us in our mission to help customers accelerate business transformation with simple, powerful, and secure solutions.
 



 The ideal candidate thrives in an innovative, fast\\-paced environment and is collaborative, accountable, ready, and empathetic. We’re looking for individuals who believe they can accomplish more as a team and create lasting growth for themselves and others. We hire based on attitude, competency, and commitment. Solarians are ready to advance our world\\-class solutions in a fast\\-paced environment and accept the challenge to lead with purpose. If you’re looking to build your career with an exceptional team, you’ve come to the right place. Join SolarWinds and grow with us!
 



  
 



 We are seeking a Senior Staff Software Engineer to join our world\\-class Database Engineering organization. This team is responsible for the development and maintenance of a suite of industry\\-leading database performance monitoring and related applications. These products improve the quality of life for database professionals by providing best\\-in\\-class performance monitoring and productivity solutions across multiple database platforms.
 



 This position will be ideal for you if you enjoy building enterprise solutions that are architected for high scale, reliability, security, and performance, are adept at developing upon requirements through delivery to impact customers on a global scale and are also able to upskill the engineering organization by example. You should be excited to work with multiple tech stacks, solving complicated problems on multiple products and platforms.
 



 In this role, you will technically lead the development of our existing industry\\-leading solutions, and help define the future of database capabilities on our Database Performance Analyzer product
 



**Responsibilities:**
 \\- Develop proof of concepts and productize features that leverage new database capabilities
   

 \\- Lead architecture discussions and make high\\-level design decisions. Own and deliver complex, high\\-impact features end\\-to\\-end.
   

 \\- Think outside of the current technology/stack limitations to push the boundaries on what is possible and deliver feasible solutions collaboratively.
   

 \\- Promote a culture of engineering excellence and strengthen the database technical expertise of our engineering and product teams.
   

 \\- Work closely with Product Managers, Designers, other engineers, and stakeholders to translate business requirements into technical solutions.
   

 \\- Serve as a technical mentor and role model to other engineers.
   

 \\- Advise engineering and product management on technical roadmap, ensuring that the vision aligns with broader company objectives. That will further cement our industry leader position in database monitoring and insights
   

 \\- Partner with product leaders to understand customer pain points and market opportunities and translate them into clear and robust engineering solutions.
 



**Qualifications:** 



* 12\\+ years of professional software engineering experience in designing and delivering large\\-scale enterprise systems.
* Production experience with independent development in
	+ Java
	+ Spring Framework
	+ JavaScript, jQuery
	+ Angular (Nova Framework)
	+ SQL



 SolarWinds is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. title: Software Engineer
description:
**About The Company**
 Mastercard is a global technology company in the payments industry, facilitating secure and seamless financial transactions across the world. With operations in over 200 countries and territories, Mastercard powers economies and empowers individuals, businesses, and governments by providing innovative digital payment solutions. Our mission is to build a sustainable economy where everyone can prosper by offering a wide range of digital payment choices that are secure, simple, smart, and accessible. Through cutting\\-edge technology, strategic partnerships, and a vast network, Mastercard delivers a suite of products and services designed to help users realize their greatest potential in a rapidly evolving digital landscape.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly motivated and detail\\-oriented Software Engineer II to join Mastercard's Franchise and Legal Solutions (FLS) team. The successful candidate will play a pivotal role in developing and maintaining critical products related to customer onboarding, customer performance management, risk monitoring, and transaction monitoring. This role involves working closely with cross\\-functional teams to deliver high\\-quality software solutions that meet evolving business needs and ensure the security and integrity of Mastercard's multi\\-rail ecosystem. The engineer will contribute to testing strategies, automation frameworks, and continuous improvement processes, helping to uphold Mastercard’s standards of excellence in software quality and security.
   

  

 The ideal candidate will have a strong technical background, excellent problem\\-solving skills, and the ability to collaborate effectively with stakeholders and third\\-party resources. This position offers an opportunity to work on innovative solutions that directly impact Mastercard’s operations and customer experience, making it an exciting role for professionals passionate about software engineering, quality assurance, and financial technology.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The candidate should possess a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science or a related field, or equivalent work experience. Hands\\-on experience in software development and testing is essential, particularly in building reliable, scalable, and secure applications. Strong organizational skills, attention to detail, and a systematic approach to test strategy analysis are required. Knowledge of test automation frameworks, especially with Java, is crucial, along with experience testing across microservices, databases, and various protocols such as SFTP, sockets, HTTPs, and RPC.
   

  

 Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines, code coverage tools, and cloud platforms like Pivotal Cloud Foundry, AWS, Azure, or GCP is preferred. Experience working within Agile methodologies, collaborating with development teams, and ensuring system reliability and performance is highly valued. Additional skills include security testing, scripting in Java or TypeScript, and understanding of software engineering principles. Excellent communication and organizational skills are essential for success in this role.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Contribute to the development and enhancement of Mastercard’s customer onboarding, performance management, and risk monitoring products.
* Implement and maintain test automation frameworks to improve testing efficiency and coverage, utilizing tools such as Playwright and Java.
* Design, execute, and analyze various testing types including unit, functional, and integration tests to ensure software quality.
* Proactively monitor production environments and customer insights to identify issues, gather feedback, and implement continuous improvements.
* Collaborate with developers, product managers, and stakeholders to ensure system reliability, performance, and security.
* Drive quality automation initiatives and promote a self\\-service culture within the team to streamline testing and deployment processes.
* Participate in Agile development cycles, contributing to sprint planning, stand\\-ups, and retrospectives.
* Ensure adherence to Mastercard’s security policies and standards, conducting security testing and vulnerability assessments as needed.
* Maintain comprehensive documentation of testing procedures, results, and best practices for ongoing reference and training.


**Benefits**
 Mastercard offers a competitive benefits package designed to support the health, well\\-being, and professional growth of our employees. This includes comprehensive health insurance, retirement plans, paid time off, and flexible working arrangements. Employees have access to ongoing training and development programs to enhance their skills and career progression. Mastercard fosters a collaborative and inclusive work environment that encourages innovation, diversity, and work\\-life balance. Additionally, employees are eligible for various wellness programs, employee discounts, and recognition initiatives that promote a positive and engaging workplace culture.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Mastercard is committed to fostering an inclusive environment where all employees are valued and respected. We are an equal opportunity employer, and we do not discriminate based on race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, national origin, disability, or any other protected characteristic. We believe diversity drives innovation and are dedicated to creating a workplace that reflects the communities we serve. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to any protected status, and we encourage individuals from diverse backgrounds to apply.

title: Software Engineer in Project Group
description:
**About Us**
 nCircle Tech Private Limited (Incorporated in 2012\\) empowers passionate innovators to create impactful 3D visualization software for desktop, mobile and cloud. Our domain expertise in CAD and BIM customization is driving automation with the ability to integrate advanced technologies like AI/ML and AR/VR, which empowers our clients to reduce time to market and meet business goals. nCircle has a proven track record of technology consulting and advisory services for AEC and Manufacturing industry across the globe. Our team of dedicated engineers, partner ecosystem and industry veterans are on a mission to redefine how you design and visualize.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 Job Description
   

  

* Managing the central repository for all projects and project information.
* Responsible for carrying out resource management activities including

**Requirements:**
* should have very good knowledge and experience in Power BI
* Should have good experience in process Audits
* Should have passion for handling data and creating meaningful reports.
* Should have strong interpersonal \\& communication skills.
* You should be able to develop rapport with all stakeholders in order to get the required information on time.

* You have great forecasting skills on the technology project around effort, cost, timelines
* and scheduling. You predict realistic issues before they happen and take proactive
* actions.
* You have the ability to work effectively to meet tight deadlines regardless of possible
* setbacks.
* You have excellent presentation skills

title: Back End Lead
description:
**About the Company** 




  





 Our client is looking for an experienced Technical Lead with expertise in Java Spring Boot, AWS, MySQL, and related technologies to join its dynamic team.
 



  





**About the Role** 




  





 The successful candidate will play a pivotal role in leading its technical initiatives, providing guidance to development teams, and ensuring the successful implementation of projects.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 




  




* Lead a team of software developers and engineers, providing technical guidance and mentorship
* Architect, design, and develop scalable and reliable software solutions using Java Spring Boot.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to define and implement technical strategies.
* Manage and optimize AWS cloud infrastructure for deployment, scalability, and cost\\-efficiency.
* Design and maintain MySQL databases, ensuring data integrity and performance.
* Identify and resolve technical challenges and issues in a proactive and timely manner.
* Stay updated on industry trends and emerging technologies, and recommend their adoption when applicable.
* Foster a culture of continuous improvement and best practices within the development team.







**Qualifications** 




  




* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
* Proven experience as a Technical Lead or Senior Software Engineer,
 **with 8\\-10 years of hands\\-on experience.**







**Required Skills** 




  




* Expertise in Java Spring Boot and related Spring Framework components
* Strong proficiency in AWS services, including but not limited to EC2, S3, RDS, and Lambda.
* Proficient in MySQL database design, optimization, and maintenance.
* Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker and container orchestration platforms like Kubernetes.
* Familiarity with micro services architecture and RESTful API design principles.
* Excellent problem\\-solving and debugging skills.
* Strong communication and leadership skills with the ability to mentor and motivate a team.
* Prior experience in Agile/Scrum methodologies is a plus.
* Certification in AWS and/or Spring Framework is highly desirable.



  





**Preferred Skills** 




  




* Front\\-end technologies such as React.js, React Native
* NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB, Cassandra)
* Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) pipelines
* Serverless computing (AWS Lambda)
* Messaging systems (e.g., Kafka, SQS)
* DevOps practices and tools
* Cloud security best practices



  





**Experience : 8\\-10 years**

Mentor and guide junior automation engineers and QA team members."

title: AWS Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 MatchPoint is a leading technology solutions provider dedicated to delivering innovative and scalable software services to clients across various industries. Our mission is to leverage cutting\\-edge technologies to create impactful digital solutions that drive business growth and operational excellence. With a focus on quality, agility, and customer satisfaction, MatchPoint has established a reputation for excellence in software development, cloud computing, and enterprise solutions. Our team of talented professionals is committed to continuous learning and innovation, ensuring we stay ahead in the rapidly evolving tech landscape.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Software Engineer with expertise in Node.js, TypeScript, and AWS cloud services to join our dynamic team. This role offers an exciting opportunity to work on designing, developing, and deploying scalable web services and APIs, primarily utilizing serverless architectures on AWS. The successful candidate will be responsible for creating robust GraphQL and REST\\-based services, automating infrastructure deployment through Terraform, and ensuring high\\-quality code through thorough testing and peer reviews. This position is ideal for professionals passionate about cloud\\-native development and eager to contribute to innovative projects in a collaborative environment.
   

  

**Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
* Proven experience of 3\\+ years in software development, particularly with Node.js and TypeScript.
* Strong understanding of AWS services including Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB, AppSync, IAM, and CLI tools.
* Hands\\-on experience with serverless frameworks such as Serverless Framework or similar tools.
* Proficiency in designing and implementing GraphQL APIs and RESTful web services.
* Experience with Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools, especially Terraform.
* Familiarity with container orchestration using ECS Fargate.
* Solid understanding of software development lifecycle, testing methodologies, and version control systems.
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and the ability to work effectively in a team environment.
* Strong communication skills to articulate technical concepts clearly and effectively.


**Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and test GraphQL\\-based services using AWS AppSync, ensuring optimal performance and scalability.
* Build and maintain REST/JSON Web Services utilizing Node.js and TypeScript, deploying on AWS Lambda for serverless execution.
* Implement and manage infrastructure automation scripts using Terraform to streamline AWS environment setup and updates.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to refine user stories and plan sprint activities, ensuring timely delivery of features.
* Conduct detailed design reviews and code reviews to uphold quality standards and promote best practices within the team.
* Perform unit testing and assist in troubleshooting issues during QA phases, ensuring high\\-quality deliverables.
* Maintain comprehensive documentation of technical designs, development processes, and deployment procedures.
* Provide regular updates on project status, potential risks, and blockers to stakeholders and management.
* Stay updated with the latest industry trends and incorporate best practices into development processes.


**Benefits**
 At MatchPoint, we value our employees and offer a comprehensive benefits package designed to support your professional and personal growth. Our benefits include competitive salary packages, opportunities for continuous learning and certification, and a collaborative work environment. We promote work\\-life balance through flexible work arrangements and provide access to cutting\\-edge tools and technologies. Additionally, employees have access to health insurance, paid leave, and various wellness programs aimed at fostering a healthy and productive workplace.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 MatchPoint is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, gender, age, sexual orientation, national origin, or disability. Our hiring practices are designed to ensure fairness and equal opportunity for all qualified candidates, fostering a workplace culture that values innovation, collaboration, and respect.

title: Performance Engineering
description:
**Job Description**
 Value added Service \\[Acceptance Solutions]is a Product Development (PD) Group within the Technology Team. This group is responsible for building leading edge full\\-service Payment Solutions for our customers by combining global payment processing, fraud management, payment security and reporting systems. We are a group of bright, motivated engineers and technical managers excited about building the next generation of Payment products that will drive e\\-Commerce, mobile\\-Commerce as well as POS businesses for our customers.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Accountable for creating application and infrastructure performance plans/models for a highly scalable, low\\-latency, highly\\-available and high\\-throughput payment processing system.
* Work with the architects and development team to ensure proper metrics instrumentation done in software components, to help facilitate real time and remote troubleshooting/performance monitoring.
* Hands on experience in Unix/Linux OS environments and operating system internals, file systems, disk/storage and networking protocols System internals. Having working knowledge with VMs and Containers.
* Expert knowledge and strong experience using tools, Loadrunner/Jmeter,. etc. and understanding of APM solutions like Appdynamics, dynatrace, OPNET,. etc
* Coding Knowledge in programming languages like Java/Python and scripting languages is must
* Evaluate, develop and execute load test tools to stress the limits of most critical payment applications.
* Understand and performance test the APIs, abstractions and integration patterns to solve challenging distributed computing problems.
* Should have experience in defining Performance Strategy and reporting performance baselines required to certify Go\\-Lives. Should have strong experience in handling multiple tasks and stakeholders
* Should be well versed in documenting the steps performed during course of performance tests cycle including performance test scripts used
* Should be able to able to look at the code and suggest optimization techniques.
* Should have ability to work independently and be a team player.
* Actively contribute to capacity planning and disaster recovery exercises.
* Support in triaging and troubleshooting of issues related to performance degradation incidents in production environment
* Monitor application performance, optimize performance bottlenecks and usage to create an application capacity model.
* Help optimizing system components such as CPU/Memory/Disk/Network \\& OS/Application software for maximizing the computer resources utilization.


**Requirements**
**Qualifications**
* Bachelors and/or Masters degree in computer science or a related discipline, or equivalent work experience required
* 3 to 5 years of hands\\-on experience in Performance Engineering, Tuning, analysis or applications program development.


**We offer**
* Opportunity to work on bleeding\\-edge projects
* Work with a highly motivated and dedicated team
* Competitive salary
* Flexible schedule
* Benefits package \\- medical insurance, sports
* Corporate social events
* Professional development opportunities
* Well\\-equipped office


**About Us**
 Grid Dynamics (NASDAQ: GDYN) is a leading provider of technology consulting, platform and product engineering, AI, and advanced analytics services. Fusing technical vision with business acumen, we solve the most pressing technical challenges and enable positive business outcomes for enterprise companies undergoing business transformation. A key differentiator for Grid Dynamics is our 8 years of experience and leadership in enterprise AI, supported by profound expertise and ongoing investment in data, analytics, cloud \\& DevOps, application modernization and customer experience. Founded in 2006, Grid Dynamics is headquartered in Silicon Valley with offices across the Americas, Europe, and India.

title: Senior Staff Secure Software Supply Chain (f/m/div)
description:
Imagine leading the transformation of secure software development and redefining how security powers innovation. As a Senior Staff Secure Software Supply Chain professional, you’ll own AppSecOps/DevSecOps and configuration management tools, implementing advanced strategies, collaborating across teams, and building a robust software supply chain. Join our team in Iasi and turn complex challenges into impactful solutions and make your mark on the industry.
   

  

**Job Description**
 In this role, you will play a key part in driving secure software development by managing AppSecOps/DevSecOps and configuration management tools to align with organizational goals. You'll have the opportunity to integrate cutting\\-edge security practices, collaborate with diverse stakeholders, measure success through impactful KPIs, and create valuable resources to support tool adoption and innovation.
   

  

 In your new role you will:
   

  

* Manage Application Portfolio to ensure AppSecOps/DevSecOps and configuration tools align with organizational goals
* Implement strategies to ensure a secure Software Supply Chain, including secure design, threat modeling, and coding practices
* Integrate AppSecOps/DevSecOps to embed security and ensure compliance
* Manage Configuration Management tools to ensure accurate tracking and compliance, while creating and maintaining user guides, technical notes, and knowledge base articles to support tool usage
* Engage with stakeholders to align strategies and ensure effective communication across teams and leadership
* Track metrics and provide reporting by developing KPIs to measure tool effectiveness and delivering regular updates to stakeholders


**Your Profile**
 You are a collaborative problem\\-solver with excellent communication and analytical skills, bringing a deep understanding of modern security practices and their integration into development lifecycles. Your strategic mindset and ability to work seamlessly across teams enable you to bridge the gap between technical solutions and business objectives effectively.
   

  

 You are best equipped for this task if you have:
   

  

* A bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science, Information Security, or related field
* At least 8 years of experience in software security, with a focus on AppSecOps/DevSecOps and configuration management
* Proficiency in programming languages, such as Java, Python, or C\\+\\+ and experience with AppSecOps/DevSecOps tools, such as Coverity, CheckMarx, SonarQube, JFrog Xray
* Knowledge of configuration management tools, such as Ansible, Puppet, or Chef and familiarity with cloud platforms, such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud
* Knowledge and hands\\-on experience with containerization technologies, and Enterprise Kubernetes like OpenShift
* Experience with Agile methodologies and the ability to thrive in fast\\-paced environments while prioritizing multiple tasks
* Excellent communication, interpersonal, and analytical skills with a strong ability to solve problems effectively


**Please send us your CV in English.**
**Contact:**
 Diana Sabença, LinkedIn
   

  

**\\#WeAreIn for driving decarbonization and digitalization.**
 As a global leader in semiconductor solutions in power systems and IoT, Infineon enables game\\-changing solutions for green and efficient energy, clean and safe mobility, as well as smart and secure IoT. Together, we drive innovation and customer success, while caring for our people and empowering them to reach ambitious goals. Be a part of making life easier, safer and greener.
   

  

**Are you in?**
* Infineon Romania develops semiconductor products for the automotive, industrial, security and IoT applications \\- In Romania, we have a strong and growing presence in Bucharest, Brasov, Iasi and now Cluj. These sites serve as key centers for research and development activities, driving innovation and excellence in the semiconductor industry. Infineon Romania has a team of talented engineers who are engaged in exploring new technologies and solutions to address the evolving challenges of our times in decarbonization and digitalization.


 By leveraging our expertise in microelectronics, digital security and now expanding into areas such as Memory Solutions, IT and Quality Management, our R\\&D centers contribute to the development of innovative semiconductor products that make our lives easier, safer, and greener.
   

  

**We are on a journey to create the best Infineon for everyone.**
 This means we embrace diversity and inclusion and welcome everyone for who they are. At Infineon, we offer a working environment characterized by trust, openness, respect and tolerance and are committed to give all applicants and employees equal opportunities. We base our recruiting decisions on the applicant´s experience and skills. Learn more about our various contact channels.
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your resume, even if you do not entirely meet all the requirements of the job posting.
   

  

 Please let your recruiter know if they need to pay special attention to something in order to enable your participation in the interview process.
   

  

 Click here for more information about Diversity \\& Inclusion at Infineon.

title: Senior:Odoo Developer
description:
Why Join Machinser?
   

 Machinser Group is a trusted Odoo Silver Partner, delivering smart, scalable, and cost\\-effective ERP, CRM, and automation solutions across the GCC and India. We are driving digital transformation for businesses in Saudi Arabia, UAE, Bahrain, and India – and we’re growing fast!
   

  

 🖥️Key Responsibilities:
   

 \\-Design, develop, and customize Odoo modules as per project requirements
   

 \\-Implement integrations with third\\-party systems and tools
   

 \\-Optimize and troubleshoot existing Odoo applications for performance and usability
   

 \\-Perform Odoo installation, configuration, and deployment on production servers (not just local hosting)
   

 \\-Maintain and upgrade Odoo versions as needed
   

  

 ⚖️Requirements:
   

 \\-Minimum 3\\+ year of hands\\-on experience in Odoo ERP development
   

 \\-Strong proficiency in Python and PostgreSQL
   

 \\-Experience in customization, module development, and integration within the Odoo framework
   

 \\-Experience in Odoo installation, server setup, and deployment
   

 \\-Ability to work independently in a remote environment
   

 \\-Keralites preferred
